headline.main: THE DANCE: MISCELLANY; Ballet Theatre Repertory -- Concerts and Other Events on Current Calendar

lead_paragraph: THE Ballet Theatre duly opened on Wednesday evening at the Forty-fourth Street Theatre under the auspices of the New Opera Company. Though the premiere occurred too late for comment in these columns, be it recorded that the program contained the first New York showing of a ballet by Michel Fokine, which is always an event.
abstract: Aid to Brit: N Y C Natl League of Amer Citizens of Foreign Descent plans Foster Parents Plan benefit
